title: Say yes
lyrics: Ni nun ape wassjanha Naega yeogi issjanha Neo ui ipsullo mareul haejwo Say yes say yes Nado moreu ge neoege gago issna bwa Buneun barame nae mam jeonhal lae Love is true.. Ganjireopgeman neukkyeojideon nun bicci Ijeneun iksuk hadandeusi useum jisji Geu jjogeuro georeogagiman hamyeon dwae Rago chingu deureun gyesokhaeseo nal buchugijiman .. Ajigeun mugeoun gu duui dwit gup Charari beoseobeorigo sipeun i bamui kkeut .. Soneul naemireo jwosseumyeon hae Maenballo neoege ttwieogal su issge kkeum .. Bokjaphagimanhan harue Mae si gan meorireul gullijiman nan .. Jigeumeseoya kkaedareun geonde Gyeol guk da beoryeojigo neoman nama .. Jinan bomeneun neol uyeonhi bwassgo Deo isangeun uyeoni ani yeosseumyeon hae .. Seuchigiman haessdeon neoui soneul japgo Eotteon girirado gati georeosseumyeon hae Ni nun ape wassjanha Naega yeogi issjanha Neo ui ipsullo mareul haejwo Say yes say yes Nado moreu ge neoege gago issna bwa Buneun barame nae mam jeonhal lae Love is true.. huhuuhuuhu huuhuhuu I need u.. huhuuhuuhu huu Baby neoege hago peun mal Naega mosdahan mal Baby baby baby boy Love is true.. Eodideun gal su isseo igeon geojismari aniya .. Ijebuteoneun naui yeopi jeil pyeonhan jari ya Ipsureul omeurigo nae neun soriwa gati Nae i reumeul bulleojwosseum johges seo Naega dwiro tteoreojyeoseo geotdeorado danji I moksorireul deureojwosseum johgesseo Ni nun ape wassjanha Naega yeogi issjanha Neo ui ipsullo mareul haejwo Say yes say yes Nado moreu ge neoege gago issna bwa Buneun barame nae mam jeonhal lae .. Naega baraneun dan hangaji Niga naegyeote isseojuneun geot Niga nal bomyeo useojuneungeosdo Nae yaegil deureojuneungeosdo Nan geugeollodo chungbunhan de.. (you)  Neoreul bomyeo usjanha Nu nuni malhajanha Neo do ireohge daedaphaejwo Say yes say yes Neoraseo jo ha niga nal ullyeodo jo ha Neoneun naui modeun jeonbunik ka Love is true.. huhuuhuuhu huuhuhuu I need u .. huhuuhuuhu huu Baby neoege hago peun mal Naega mosdahan mal Baby baby baby boy Love is true..
